descriptionHTML:
aWARemote for Winamp®

Simply the most beautiful and extensive Winamp® remote control for Android.

Take control over the Winamp® media player on your PC - with your Android Smartphone. Control the current playback, manage the current playlist and access your media library.
aWARemote for Winamp® offers all this, and more.

Awards:
telefon.de - "Cool App"

Try it now! These are the features that aWARemote for Winamp® offers:

- Control over current playback
- Manage and save current playlist
- Access Winamp's queue function
- Access the Winamp media library and your saved playlists (limited to 500 songs and 5 playlists in free version)
- Search the Winamp media library
- turn visualizations on and off
- Equalizer
- Light and dark theme
- Modern Holo UI and easy handling
- Comprehensive options
- Start Winamp from your smartphone
- 2 widgets
- Support for creating multiple profiles for different computers
- Wake on LAN directly in the app
- Sleep timer
- File browser [aWARemote Pro only]
- Password-protected and AES secured Client-Server connection (optional)

200.000 users and a 4,7/5 stars rating for aWARemote Pro for Winamp® speak for themselves.
Also become one of the satisfied users of aWARemote for Winamp® and try it now.

To make aWARemote for Winamp® work, you have to install aWARemote Server on your computer. You can get it at http://www.geb-dev.com/download. This will also install the aWARemote Server Helper Plugin in Winamp®, which is mandatory for the queue feature support.

If you have any problems with the setup, check out the FAQ section at http://www.geb-dev.de. In this section you will also find an explanation for the required permissions the app asks for.

For further help send an Email to contact@geb-dev.com.

Winamp® is a trademark of AOL, Inc.
comments: Loving it! Using it alongside my Bluetooth speaker, and it's great. Only complaint so far is that reordering songs under "Now Playing" playlist doesn't seem to work quite right. Might be because my library is huge or that I'm using the free version. Really considering the paid, full version of this app regardless of what's causing it. ðŸ˜ƒ

Almost perfect but one big mistake Unable to read Imported playlists. Playlist viewer will not work if playlist is imported even with pls, wpl, m3u or m3u8 format. Adding playlist to playlist editor wont be able to play song too. Dang. 100+ of my playlists weren't working. Solution can be made by deselecting use orignal playlist instead of a winamp managed copy.
If you got Winamp  and are lookng for a remote you can't do better than this! Does everything you need, and is clean and faultless. I'm gonna buy it!

Very well done Clearly a lot of effort was put into this. This is a very feature-packed Winamp remote control with a good looking and functional interface (especially the dark one). On the server/plugin side, the encryption, and the ability to actually remotely turn Winamp on is a major plus. Wish I could select which interface to listen on, but Windows Firewall works for now. Great job, guys!
Cant edit or delete playlist in free mode. so once a playlist is saved, its there, even if you delete cache and data and uninstall. will give 5 stars if these features is added.
Used to work fine, but now the server "is not a valid win32 app".  None of the older versions work either.
recentChanges: - Fixed: Back button at top left not working on various views
- Fixed: scrolling position of list in file browser is now saved when opening another window
